thread.title: Pat Griffin Named President of Marmon-Herrington
thread.title_full: Pat Griffin Named President of Marmon-Herrington - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Pat Griffin Named President of Marmon-Herrington
text:
Marmon-Herrington
LOUISVILLE, Ky. , Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Pat Griffin has been named president of Marmon-Herrington , global leaders in drivetrain innovation, power and performance. With more than 25 years experience in the transportation industry, Griffin most recently served as vice president of sales for Fontaine Modification Company's Vocational Services where he was instrumental in the business unit's strategic direction and growth.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271423
Prior to joining Fontaine Modification last year, Griffin held executive leadership positions in engineering, quality, and Lean Six Sigma with Wabash National Corporation and Hayes Lemmerz International. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in welding engineering from The Ohio State University , and a Master of Arts in organizational management from Tusculum College .
"We are fortunate to have a person of Pat's caliber to lead Marmon-Herrington into the future," says Kent Finkbiner , group president of MHT Commercial Truck. "Having worked globally with both OEM and aftermarket providers in heavy-duty truck, automotive, and rail transportation markets, he brings a knowledge base which will serve us well."
Marmon-Herrington is a leading developer of drivetrain technology with roots dating back to the 1850s. The company offers durable axles and transfer cases for trucks and specialized vehicles, along with OEM solutions and installation kits. Its products are used in a wide range of applications, including military, forestry, mining and construction.
Headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky , Marmon-Herrington is a Marmon Highway Technologies Â® /Berkshire Hathaway company. Marmon Highway Technologies (MHT) supports the highway transportation industry worldwide with a diverse portfolio of products and services. For more information about Marmon-Herrington, visit www.marmon-herrington.com or call 800-227-0727.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/pat-griffin-named-president-of-marmon-herrington-300150136.html
